Package breakout.core.logging

Class Logger

java.lang.Object
breakout.core.logging.SeverableLogger
breakout.core.logging.Logger
All Implemented Interfaces:
DefaultDependenciesInjectable, Loggable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AuditLogger, EventLogger, SystemLogger
public abstract class Logger extends SeverableLogger implements DefaultDependenciesInjectable
Outlines the entire functionality of the logger.

    • getTimestamp

      public static String getTimestamp(int year, int month, int day, int hour, int minute, int second)
      Retrieve a specific timestamp in the format of yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss. Values will be calculated based on the given integers.
      Parameters:
      year - The year.
      month - The month.
      day - The day.
      hour - The hour.
      minute - The minute.
      second - The second.
      Returns:
      The timestamp in the given format.
